entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Port-Menier
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:01 PM EST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -7.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Port Menier 02:00 AM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023
Temperature: -7.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.8 kPa falling
Humidity: 84 %
Wind Chill: -12
Dewpoint: -9.8°C
Wind: NNW 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness near noon. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 50 near noon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning and minus 11 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 10 in the evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 23 January 2023
